com.abbyy.mobile.rtr

Interface ITextCaptureService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IRecognitionService

    public interface ITextCaptureService
extends IRecognitionService
    A text capture service interface.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  ITextCaptureService.Callback
      A callback interface to interact with the text capture service: input the data and obtain the results.

      Extended information about the characters' formatting.
      static interface  ITextCaptureService.ExtendedSettings
      Extended service configuration settings.
      static class  ITextCaptureService.TextLine

    • Method Detail

      • setRecognitionLanguage

        void setRecognitionLanguage(Language... languages)
        Sets the languages to be used for recognition.

        By default, only English language is set. Setting the correct languages for your text will improve recognition accuracy. However, setting too many languages may slow down performance.

        Parameters:
        languages - one or more languages to be used for recognition

      • setTranslationDictionary

        void setTranslationDictionary(java.lang.String dictionaryName)
        Sets the name of the translation dictionary.

        By default, no translation dictionary is used. Translation dictionaries should be put in the 'assets\translation' folder.

        Parameters:
        dictionaryName - the name of the translation dictionary file without extension

      • getExtendedSettings

        ITextCaptureService.ExtendedSettings getExtendedSettings()
        Extended service configuration settings. Settings for advanced users. Not used in typical scenarios
        Specified by:
        getExtendedSettings in interface IRecognitionService
        Returns:
        extended service configuration settings
